snippet: When Dr. Reeves took charge of research on the syndrome, patients and advocacy groups had been complaining that the government was not taking it seriously.
abstract: Dr William C Reeves, epidemiologist who sought the cause of chronic fatigue syndrome, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: When Dr. Reeves took charge of research on the syndrome, patients and advocacy groups had been complaining that the government was not taking it seriously.

headline.main: Dr. William C. Reeves, Who Sought Cause of Fatigue Syndrome, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Dr. William C. Reeves Dies at 69; Sought Cause of Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
